data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: One of the common ways to show appreciation to people who have supported me is to simply say "Thank you". This is the most common and direct way of showing appreciation. Other methods include listening to people carefully and empathetically, paying attention to them, and being reliable. This is because the people who support you also need your support. Listening to them is the most effective way to return the kind of support that most people would want. Being reliable is also very important as it gives people an impression that you value the relationship and you are a reliable person when they need help from you. Therefore, there are many ways to show appreciation to people who have supported me.
data.referenceText: In what ways can you show appreciation to people who have supported you?
data.referenceTranslate: 你可以用什么方式来感谢那些支持你的人?
